√gā2 'sing'

present: [4.] gā́yati etc. V.+  gā́yate etc. V.+   -- [1.] gāti  gānti   -- gāyiṣe (1s.)  

perfect: jagau etc. B.+  jage etc.  

aorist: [1.] geyāt  agāyi   -- [4.] gāsi (1s.)   -- [6.] agāsīt  agāsiṣus etc.  gāsiṣat  

future: [1.] gāsyati etc. B.+  agāsyat etc.   -- [2.] gātā  

verbal: gītá V.+  gātum B.+  gītvā B.+  -gāya  -gī́ya  

secondary: passive: gīyáte etc. V.+  gīyant   -- intensive: jegīyate etc. E.+  jāgā-   -- desiderative: -- causative: gāpayati etc. B.+  gāpayate  ajīgapat  gāyayeyus  

derivatives: -gā V.+  -ga AV.+  -gāya C.  gāyaka E.+  -gāyin C.  gāyatrá V.+  gāyana S.+  -gā́yas RV.  gātú RV.  gātavya C.  gātṛ V.+  gāthá V.+  gā́thā V.+  gāna U.S.+  -gāman RV.  gīti S.+  gī́tha AV.+  geya B.+  -geṣṇa AB.  -jigītha  -ta B.U.  -gāpana S.
